attributes.action: Issue the Queen Elizabeth 1977 Silver Jubilee medal.
attributes.additional_details: Issue in retrospect the Silver Jubilee to all Armed Forces Veterans who's service to the  Queen & Country was ignored.
attributes.background: I was in the Royal Navy at the time of the 1977 Silver Jubilee, serving on HMS Gurkha at the Royal Spithead Review, the last Naval review to take place. If I remember correctly only 1 or 2 medals where awarded to members of the crew and went to the Captain and another senior rank.

rejection.details:
The Government will only accept individual nominations for honours, not petitions, so we can’t publish your petition.

To submit a nomination for an honour, visit: http://www.gov.uk/honours/
